Articles.Content:
You may now release your ego.

This is a place where those attached to their ribbonless signatures may show off their ribbons. i.e,

For those who don't know what ribbons are, Check the link here.

http://ribbons.cgagnier.ca/index.php

Let the egos flow like spice.

|

v

I'm still upset about my Jool ribbons. They would have been way more extensive if I didn't get the docking port bug.

|

v

I'm still upset about my Jool ribbons. They would have been way more extensive if I didn't get the docking port bug.

My Jool ribbons tell a story. Read in this order. Jool, Vall, Laythe. It becomes apparent why Jool and Co. are part of Ike's devious plan to annoy the heck outta us.

Here's how useless your ribbon things are:

There's nothing stopping you from making up stuff.

You can't proof that I didn't finish all these missions by playing 24/7 for a few months.

Yeah, but there's nothing to stop you using photoshop in the challenges, or Hyperedit to finish any challenge It's assumed that people will be honest, because what's the point of showing them off, otherwise?

because what's the point of showing them off

That's my point, you can't just assume "well people are going to be honest with that", because in reality, when there's something to cheat, people will cheat.
My biggest achievement since the Laythe Exploration Expedition: The ARES Interstellar Depot. 212 tons in Duna Orbit.

That's my point, you can't just assume "well people are going to be honest with that", because in reality, when there's something to cheat, people will cheat.

Fine, if a couple of people want to cheat by lying then, while that's uncool of them, it doesn't really affect the rest of us who are being honest and are happy to admire one another's accomplishments.

Whom I suspect are the overwhelming majority.
Lets get back on topic here people
Also, I didn't realize that the ribbons got an update. Better redo mine and fill in the other things I did! (I rescued the 27 Kerbals trapped in the Oblivion with the broken docking ports)

Here we are. Haven't done this before, was tricky to remember/decide what to put.

Oops! forgot my probe that impacted the sun. Never mind.

Edited September 27, 2013 by Tw1
I'll add mine
In my signature. I don't get a lot done lol.

I know you said those with ribbonless signatures, but my ego can't help it either.

I guess most things seam obvious in it. The Vall Lander will return, I just want to wait for a launch window instead of time warping all the way.

Havn't gotten much done at Eve. I just lobbed a leftover Duna probe stage at it because it had a bunch of fuel left.

I just lobbed a leftover Duna probe stage at it because it had a bunch of fuel left.

This made me laugh.

"THIS is what I think of your gravity well, Eve!" *whap!*

Here's mine:

NO MODS 4 LYFE #YOLOSWAG420NOSCOPE

Edited September 27, 2013 by regex
Forgot the underscore. Whooops...

Look at my sig.

I've been playing since 0.15 In case anyone was wondering
Edited September 27, 2013 by fatfluffycat

There's nothing stopping you from making up stuff.

You ribbons don't give you any prestige, either. You put them up for yourself, not for others.

They also say "I was there and I know the whereabouts". Meaning somebody can e.g. ask you how did you get there and how did you solve some problem he is facing.

|

V

sorry, can't help it the only one I used mods with was the EVE probe, back in .20 when I still used mods. anyway, I still got a lot to do.

Also, I think rage097 got a bit bugged when he saw I changed my sig to ribbons and he made this.

Edited September 27, 2013 by M.Wolfy
I don't get lots done since although I play KSP a good bit, I never have the time to finish things, so heres my pretty bad one:

You ribbons don't give you any prestige
They also say "I was there and I know the whereabouts". Meaning somebody can e.g. ask you how did you get there and how did you solve some problem he is facing.

Wait, what? Ribbons don't mean anything, they're ego-pieces as OP points out. Trusting someone's words over another''s because they have some random ribbon in their sig is selling yourself short.

Edited September 27, 2013 by regex

Hmmm? I can assure you that is not the case.

@zebolte: Sure, but who really cares if you cheat? Or lie? No one really. And most people are fairly honest here anyway. Point is, Cheat and lie all you want. No one gives a crap.
Iv'e been kinda lazy in .21 so far .22 will be a grand tour with all those science bays.

Hello there

Alright guys, last warning. This thread is not about how much one can cheat about ribbons, so please cut that. The ribbons - and that's the very argument the "you can cheat anyway!" side brings up - have no impact, so there's really no point arguing about that.

FEichinger
